tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Naveen is an amazing professional. In a time where world is dealing with such pandemic we need more doctors like him who is an expert in diagnosing and curing health concerns especially in medicine and pulmonary. He takes time with every patient and listens to what they tell him. He runs tests as appropriate. He follows up with patient on regular intervals for their health check up and progress. I’ll recommend Dr Naveen for any healthcare concern and I’m  confident that he will address it to the best of his ability or get to someone who can.
Dr Elwadhi is a allrounder.  He is Humble and very knowledgeable. He goes to the root cause of disease.

I visited him a year back when I was in a terrible condition ,wasn't able to speak a word, had breathing problems,cold and cough but after took treatment from him  and now never  experience such bad  sick experience again
*** ****** ******** ** **** ************  He understand problem calmly and give proper treatment. Along with medicines, he advised for some Yoga Aassna, ,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Rare to find such good doctors. I have consulted many docs for treatment of my kid's asthma but he was the only one to provide **** treatment without any side effects.

The doctor is great in his field of expertise that is lungs & respiratory related issues. I just went for reoccurring fever and was looking to have it diagnosed from the perspective of a General Physician. I got medicines & tests done which amounted way more than what a usual treatment to my immediate condition requires.
